```{r}

#function for fold change 
calculate_fold <- function(data_matrix) {
  cond_cols <- grep("^cond", colnames(data_matrix))
  ctrl_cols <- grep("^ctrl", colnames(data_matrix))
  
  fold_change <- data_matrix[, cond_cols] / data_matrix[, ctrl_cols]
  
  return(fold_change)
}

# Compute 
fold_change_matrix <- calculate_fold(data_matrix)

# Print the fold change matrix
print(fold_change_matrix)
```
